original_text: No, the wise thoughts that we speak about belong to God. He has hidden them from people until now. But before God made the world, he decided to let us know these secrets. He wanted us to enjoy his glory.
korean_text: 오직 은밀한 가운데 있는 하나님의 지혜를 말하는 것으로서 곧 감추어졌던 것인데 하나님이 우리의 영광을 위하여 만세 전에 미리 정하신 것이라

sentences.original_text: No, the wise thoughts that we speak about
He has hidden them from people until now
But before God made the world
he decided to let us know these secrets
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리에게 이 비밀들을 알게 하기로 결정하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He wanted us to enjoy his glory
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리가 그의 영광을 누리기를 원하셨습니다
